ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration of JESSICA LEE MCDONALD, interim President and Chief Executive Officer of the Canada Post Corporation, effective April 1, 2018, until such time as she is no longer required to act as President and Chief Executive Officer of the Corporation.
